# Send notifications and market intelligently, across platforms
Communicate with millions of your users across push, email, sms and other channels. Segment, re-target, and message to your heart's content with an affordable open source platform. Use our **_cloud_** or **_self-hosting_** options.
[Get Started](https://laudspeaker.com/<https:/app.laudspeaker.com/>)[Join Community![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636148ce188ecb92e3a6c055/6509cf69796edd1a90e07847_Vectors-Wrapper.svg)](https://laudspeaker.com/<https:/join.slack.com/t/laudspeakerusers/shared_invite/zt-2yo35qez4-EHj_ag9~M6JtO5rq_DyvTQ>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636148ce188ecb92e3a6c055/65e81a3c30c9e041290ce66d_herosection.gif)
## Create best in class user journeys across push, email and sms
Give users the nudge they need to get to their 'aha' moment, over and over again
[Documentation![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636148ce188ecb92e3a6c055/6509d1ec8d3bc11ae7e8c548_Vectors-Wrapper.svg)](https://laudspeaker.com/<https:/laudspeaker.com/docs/overview/introduction>)
[Welcome](https://laudspeaker.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[Re-engagement](https://laudspeaker.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[Promotion](https://laudspeaker.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)[Renewal](https://laudspeaker.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636148ce188ecb92e3a6c055/65e81d233db58cff744d87b2_Welcome.png)
## Welcome users with a timed campaign
Messaging customers at core touch points helps make your product feel more personal, and welcoming. Use Laudspeaker to set up a drip campaing, and personalize messages based on customer attributes
[Get Started![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636148ce188ecb92e3a6c055/6509d200bbd15e5260e9cdbf_Vectors-Wrapper.svg)](https://laudspeaker.com/<#>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636148ce188ecb92e3a6c055/65e81d1320d945d9e0bcbebb_Re-engage.png)
## Re-engage your users
Send messages to your dormant users, if they don't complete core actions, or after pre-determined lengths of time to keep your product top of mind
[Get Started![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636148ce188ecb92e3a6c055/6509d200bbd15e5260e9cdbf_Vectors-Wrapper.svg)](https://laudspeaker.com/<#>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636148ce188ecb92e3a6c055/65e81d0030c9e041290e5395_Promotion%202.png)
## Send the right promotion
Use Laudspeaker's A/B test feature to send the right promotions to the right users at the right time
[Get Started![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636148ce188ecb92e3a6c055/6509d200bbd15e5260e9cdbf_Vectors-Wrapper.svg)](https://laudspeaker.com/<#>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636148ce188ecb92e3a6c055/65e81cec3add4168961ba8a0_Renew.png)
## Cut down on churn
Use well timed renewal campaigns to proactively message users before they forget to renew. Pick the right messaging channel for them, and switch channels if they don't respond via one.
Laudspeaker sends over 100 million messages a week
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636148ce188ecb92e3a6c055/6509d24b544d1e2bc70ac8af_Vectors-Wrapper.svg)
Laudspeaker is the only solution we've found that is easy to use, cross-channel and self-hostable.
Fortune 500 fintech
VP Digital Transformation
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636148ce188ecb92e3a6c055/6509d24b544d1e2bc70ac8af_Vectors-Wrapper.svg)
Laudspeaker has made it so easy to build messaging journeys, and create flows for different personas.
Leading Bank in South Korea
Manager CRM marketing

Start
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636148ce188ecb92e3a6c055/6524b996704715d59d931cec_feature0-1.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636148ce188ecb92e3a6c055/6524b9acde8972482c1f0e96_feature0-2.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636148ce188ecb92e3a6c055/6524b9d4c942b934675a1e69_feature0-3.png)
## Integrate and build with our sdk 
Integrate our ios and android sdks to send and recieve push notifications; custom user events; and track opens and clicks. Check out our docs, tutorials and source code to understand exactly how it works!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636148ce188ecb92e3a6c055/650a04c7c7b89f295a414ac2_feature1.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636148ce188ecb92e3a6c055/650a034679539529178af41b_feature1-2.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636148ce188ecb92e3a6c055/650a0346e1a88deacd1c870a_feature1-1.png)
## Build User Journeys Visually
Build mobile specific or omni-channel messaging flows quickly, and intuitively in a visual tool everyone can understand. Branch, loop, and run complex logic quickly and clearly.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636148ce188ecb92e3a6c055/650a04c726863ed85b3f14a9_feature2.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636148ce188ecb92e3a6c055/650c03d7e0a10b45d1a54fa0_feature2-1.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636148ce188ecb92e3a6c055/650c00f5d6174a43ccf29007_feature2-2.png)
## Target different Personas and Segments
Personalize messaging flows based on their persona, by using our robust segmentation capabilities. Split users by different attribute types, events they have performed or messages they have received.
üîî
Publish Journey
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636148ce188ecb92e3a6c055/650a04c77120d4cc86d3dcf2_feature3.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636148ce188ecb92e3a6c055/650c053c33ac6663452fdcde_feature3-2.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/636148ce188ecb92e3a6c055/650c053c5ce40418f5729ce4_feature3-1.png)
## Monitor and Analyze
Understand which step in your onboarding journey or messaging flow your user is in. Track their success, iterate and update your messaging flows to improve conversion.
